pyt.tresc: Which of the following are filter streams in the java.io package?

pyt.odp: If StringBuilder is replaced by StringBuffer, the only change is that thread synchronization is removed
Code throws an exception at runtime

pyt.tresc: You want a floating poing number to be formatted in Italian format. Which of the following code snippets can help you achieve this?
pyt.odp: NumberFormat nf = new NumberFormat(Locale.Italy); String s = nf.format(123.45);
NumberFormat nf = NumberFormat.getInstance(Locale.Italy); String s = nf.format(123.45);
NumberFormat nf = NumberFormat.getInstance(); String s = nf.format(123.45, Locale.Italy);
NumberFormat nf = new NumberFormat(); String s = nf.format(123.45, Locale.Italy);

pyt.tresc: Which of the following are true about the File class?
pyt.odp: You can perform file I/O operations using its methods
You can find the size of a file using its size() method
You can check if a file exists using exists() method
You can delete a file using its delete() method
Compiler error: intValue method not defined in Number

pyt.tresc: You wish to customize serialization for your class which only implements Serializable interface. Which of the following must be done?
pyt.odp: Define the readObject and writeObject methods
Define the defaultReadObject and defaultWriteObject methods
Define the readExternal and writeExternal methods
Define the read and write methods

pyt.tresc: Which of the following statements are true?
pyt.odp: ObjectInputStream implements all operations declared in DataInputStream
DataInputStream implements all operations declered in ObjectInputStream
